title: Adults attending a classical music event in the past 12 months in the U.S. 1982 to 2012
summary: The statistic shows the percentage of worldwide classical music event past in the 12 from 1982 to 2012 .
In 2012 , 8.8 % of classical music event past were between 18 and 12.5 % were past .
gold: This statistic shows the share of adults attending a classical music event at least once in the past 12 months in the United States from 1982 to 2012.
In 2012 , 8.8 percent of U.S. adults had attended a classical music event at least once in the past year .
